turns.content: To locate a choker not located in a jewelry box or boutique where would you go?. Make the most suitable choice from these : jewelry store, neck, jewlery box, jewelry box, boutique

To locate a choker, you could try visiting a jewelry store or boutique. These types of retail establishments typically carry a variety of jewelry items, including chokers. You may also be able to find chokers at a department store or online through a retailer's website. If you are unable to find a choker at any of these locations, you could also try checking with local independent jewelers or specialty stores that focus on particular types of jewelry.
